sentence.Network_en: To calm his mind he began to take laudanum.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了镇定自己的神经,他开始服鸦片酊.

sentence.Network_en: Mrs. Shakespeare advised her to take a spoonful of laudanum for the headache.
sentence.Network_cn: 莎士比亚夫人建议她服用一片鸦片酊治她的头疼.

sentence.Network_en: Whipping and abuse are like laudanum; you have to double the dose as the sensibilities decline.
sentence.Network_cn: 谩骂与鞭打就好像鸦片, 敏感度降低时,必须加重其药量.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 柯勒律治的个人生活颇为不幸，为镇风湿痛而服鸦片酊（laudanum）又上了瘾，对他产生了极有害的影响，也妨碍了他诗才的发展。 …
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(L) ... laudably 值得赞赏地 laudanum 鸦片酒 laudation 赞美.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (applied to various preparations containing opium): modern Latin, the name given by Paracelsus to a costly medicament of which opium was believed to be the active ingredient; perhaps a variant of Latin ladanum (see ladanum)

means.word_mean: 1. narcotic consisting of a tincture of opium or any preparation in which opium is the main ingredient

auth_sentence.content: He was a poet and preferred loafing about under trees with a bottle of laudanum.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was a poet and preferred loafing about under trees with a bottle of laudanum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was a poet and preferred loafing about under trees with a bottle of laudanum.

auth_sentence.content: Most popular was laudanum - a cocktail of opium and alcohol, which is still manufactured for medical use today.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most popular was laudanum - a cocktail of opium and alcohol, which is still manufactured for medical use today.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most popular was laudanum - a cocktail of opium and alcohol, which is still manufactured for medical use today.

auth_sentence.content: Fighting the excruciating pain of rheumatic gout, Collins became addicted to laudanum, which took its toll over time.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fighting the excruciating pain of rheumatic gout, Collins became addicted to laudanum, which took its toll over time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fighting the excruciating pain of rheumatic gout, Collins became addicted to laudanum, which took its toll over time.

sentences.cn: 为了镇定自己的神经，他开始服鸦片酊。
